template.name: SAPHanaSR
template.longdesc: Create a single primitive resource of type IPaddr2.

parameter.name: sid
parameter.longdesc: SAP Identifier (SID) like SLE. The SID is always a 3 character alphanumeric string.

parameter.name: ino
parameter.longdesc: SAP Instance Number like 00. The instancenumber must be a two-digit string including leading zeros.

parameter.name: ip
parameter.longdesc: The virtual ip address to be configured to run at the primary side.

template.crm_script:
primitive rsc_ip__HDB ocf:heartbeat:IPaddr2 params ip="" cidr_netmask="" op start timeout="20" op stop timeout="20" op monitor interval="10" timeout="20"
primitive rsc_SAPHanaTopology__HDB ocf:suse:SAPHanaTopology params SID="" InstanceNumber="" op monitor interval="10" timeout="600" op start interval="0" timeout="600" op stop interval="0" timeout="300"
primitive rsc_SAPHana__HDB ocf:suse:SAPHana params SID="" InstanceNumber="" PREFER_SITE_TAKEOVER="no" DUPLICATE_PRIMARY_TIMEOUT="7200" op start interval="0" timeout="3600" op stop interval="0" timeout="3600" op promote interval="0" timeout="3600" op monitor interval="60" role="Master" timeout="700" op monitor interval="61" role="Slave" timeout="700"
